pkgmetadata.longdescription: Open-source, GPL-licensed, multiplatform, multithreaded video transcoder.

use.flag: Use FFmpeg from media-video/ffmpeg to decode MPEG-2 instead of media-plugins/gst-plugins-mpeg2dec.
Support for the streaming media framework from media-libs/gstreamer.
Support for Gimp ToolKit + from x11-libs/gtk+, requirement for a GUI-based HandBrake.
Support for encoding AAC using media-libs/fdk-aac.
Support for encoding AAC using media-libs/libav's internal encoder.
